title: Pixel XL won’t turn on
content:
Hi all,

during an automatic update received on Sep 17, my Pixel XL turned itself off and I haven’t been able to turn it back on since. I brought it to an authorised center and after 3 weeks they called me saying that there is nothing they can do to fix it. They replaced battery and screen and still nothing, it won’t boot up.

To make it clear, I haven’t launched the installation of any updates that day and the last thing I saw on the screen was a progress bar saying “finalising update”; at around 80% of the progress bar it all went blank.
Have you seen this happening before? I read of a few other users having a similar issue but never got to the bottom of having it fixed. Please let me know if there something that can be done to fix it. I was planning to move to the 4XL, but I would have liked a much more smoother transition.

Thanks,
Raffa
